title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・勝利後と次の夢

text_block_list.text: After a splendid victory over the formidable foe Rice Shower in the 'Emperor's Award (Spring)', she praised the participating Umamusume while expressing her desire to do her best in the next race as well.
The next target race is the 'Takarazuka Kinen'. The next morning, heading out for independent training, she sees Mejiro McQueen running hard.
Impressed by the sight of Matikanetannhauser running stoically, determined to channel the frustration from the 'Emperor's Award (Spring)' into the 'Takarazuka Kinen'.
Two months later, the GⅠ middle-distance race 'Takarazuka Kinen'. To seize victory, I want to train with all my might!
